name: AllWarehouses
description: Lists information about all warehouses set up in your store.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

$ul: **isActive**: Shows if the warehouse is active (`true`) or inactive (`false`).
**pickupPointIds**: This field returns a list of the [pickup points' IDs](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/pickup-points--2fljn6wLjn8M4lJHA6HP3R) associated with the given warehouse.
**priority**: If the warehouse was configured as a priority. When no priority was set, the value returns`0`.
**warehouseDocks**: Information related to the docks available for the warehouses.
